channel.title: gaming on blog // ~ben
channel.description: Recent content in gaming on blog // ~ben

item.title: pop quiz
item.description: is this real? hint: it’s not. it’s the witcher 3. and it looks like a real place.

item.title: vr
item.description: i picked up an oculus rift after my last paycheck :P it was half christmas present. these are some of the games that i’m most excited for: elite dangerous lone echo / echo arena dirt rally gun club vr eagle flight robo recall have you played any other cool vr games lately?

item.title: 4k gaming with a gtx1080ti
item.description: i recently picked up a gtx1080ti on newegg (and a 4k monitor earlier in the summer on prime day). i can’t stop playing the witcher 3. even though it’s a couple years old, it just looks so good.
